Author: Uselessschoogirl
Text: I know how you feel, last year I hit my goal weight which was 40 kg. But I didn’t stop after, I went down two more kg until Christmas came and I realised what I was doing.  But it’s great when you realise loosing weight won’t fix every problem in your life, you won’t feel perfect. I know this is cliché, but no one is perfect, and getting to your goal weight won’t make you perfect as well.
